StringTable.Label: SolSystem_Name
StringTable.String: Sol

StringTable.Label: SolSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: The human solar system containing a class 11 and a class 5 world.

StringTable.Label: DrengiSystem_Name
StringTable.String: Drengia

StringTable.Label: DrengiSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: The Drengin home system containing a class 11 and a class 5 world.

StringTable.Label: AltariaSystem_Name
StringTable.String: Altaris

StringTable.Label: AltariaSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: The Altarian home system containing a class 10 and a class 6 world.

StringTable.Label: IridiaSystem_Name
StringTable.String: Iridii

StringTable.Label: IridiaSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: The Iridium home system containing a class 12 and a class 4 world.

StringTable.Label: IconiaSystem_Name
StringTable.String: Icos

StringTable.Label: IconiaSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: The ancient Iconian, and now Yor, home system. It contains a single class 16 world.

StringTable.Label: KrysethSystem_Name
StringTable.String: Kryseth

StringTable.Label: KrysethSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: The Krynn home system. It contains a class 8, and two class 4 worlds.

StringTable.Label: IconisSystem_Name
StringTable.String: Iconis

StringTable.Label: IconisSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: The new home system of the Iconian race containing a class 13 and a class 3 world.

StringTable.Label: ThalisSystem_Name
StringTable.String: Thalis

StringTable.Label: ThalisSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: The home of the Thalan Contingency in this Universe. It contains a single class 16 world.

StringTable.Label: SnathiSystem_Name
StringTable.String: Snathos

StringTable.Label: SnathiSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: The ancient home of the Snathi It contains a single class 15 (Bread Basket) world.

StringTable.Label: MinorSystem_Name
StringTable.String: Arb System

StringTable.Label: MinorSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: Randomized home system for Minor Races. It contains a class 16 world.

StringTable.Label: DeadSystem_Name
StringTable.String: Abbydos

StringTable.Label: DeadSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: A ruined star system. No Habitable Planets, Just a burned out Rock. Used by the brave and adventuresome.

StringTable.Label: StarterSereneSystem_Name
StringTable.String: Serenity

StringTable.Label: StarterSereneSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: Contains a beautiful class 12 world with a bonus to Tourism and Approval.
